text.content: By next week, I will have finished the project. By the time you arrive, I will have cooked dinner. She will have graduated by June. By 2030, scientists will have found a cure for many diseases. By tomorrow, we will have made a decision. They will have left before you get there. By the end of the year, I will have saved enough money. By midnight, the party will have ended.

text.content: In 20 years, technology will have changed everything. By 2050, humans will have colonized Mars. In the future, robots will have replaced many jobs. By next century, we will have solved the climate crisis. Scientists believe we will have discovered alien life by 2100. By the time I'm 50, I will have traveled to every continent. In ten years, electric cars will have become the norm. By 2040, renewable energy will have replaced fossil fuels.

overview.title: Future Perfect - Completed By
overview.subtitle: Completed before a future time
overview.description: Use Future Perfect to show an action will be completed before a specific future time.

timeSignals.title: TIME MARKERS
regular: by + future time (by next week, by 2030)

commonErrors.wrong: By next week, I will finish.
commonErrors.correct: By next week, I will have finished.
commonErrors.explanation: Use Future Perfect for completion before future time.

commonErrors.wrong: I will have finish by then.
commonErrors.correct: I will have finished by then.

She will have graduated before you start university.
